scripts.test-report:
npm run test-coverage | tail -n +6 > test-report.md 2>&1 && echo '
[View test code coverage](./coverage/index.html)
' >> test-report.md
scripts.serve-docs: documentation serve --config documentation.yml --watch src/main.js src/editor/editor.js extra README.md documentation.yml
scripts.build-docs: documentation build --config documentation.yml src/main.js src/editor/editor.js -f html -o docs && cp -r coverage extra docs/
scripts.prep-release: npm run lint && npm run test-report && npm run build-docs
scripts.test-coverage: c8 --reporter html --all --include src --exclude src/**/*.spec.js mocha --require esm src/**/*.spec.js
